objective.title: Life Objective
objective.content: <i>To learn from, explore and be active in the society by efficiently & effectively utilizing my knowledge, skills & abilities on demand for the sustained & habitable evolution of the ecosystem.<i>

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.content: Computer Programming, Computer simulation of electronics & embedded systems, Sound editing, Playing simulation based computer games (4 Wheelers & Aircraft), Reading technical & philosophical books, Blogging about my philosophical & technical thoughts, Listening to instrumental, new age & melodious musics, Watching science fiction & philosophical movies, Photography, Exploring philosophical & technical information openly available through the internet.

interests.title: Areas of Interest
interests.content: Philosophy, Theosophy, Metaphysics, Spirituality, Psychology, Parapsychology, Astrology, Yoga, Ayurveda, Naturopathy, Homeopathy,Technology, Analog & Digital Electronics, Audio & Video Systems, Digital Signal Processing, Robotics & Automation, Embedded Systems, Bio-Signal  Processing, Audio Signal Processing.
